```{r}
library(surveydown)
```

::: {#page1 .sd-page}

Tell us about your vehicle:

```{r}
years <- rev(seq(2010, 2025, 1))
names(years) <- years

sd_question(
  type   = "select",
  id     = "year",
  label  = "Model year:",
  option = years
)

sd_output('make', type = 'question')

sd_output('model', type = 'question')

sd_next()
```

:::

::: {#end .sd-page}

```{r}
sd_close()
```

:::
